shortDescription.default: Displays frequently asked questions categorized for easy navigation and quick access to information

longDescription.default: Displays frequently asked questions categorized for easy navigation and quick access to information. Features include search functionality, collapsible sections for each category, and the ability to add, edit, or remove questions easily. This solution includes support for SharePoint webpart and SharePoint full page webpart components.

features.title: Next Aspect FAQs Feature
features.description: The feature that activates elements of the Next Aspect FAQs solution.
